title: Making finance accessible for MSMEs | In Conversation with Vikas Dimri (Deutsche Bank) - Economic Times
content: Making finance accessible for MSMEs | In Conversation with Vikas Dimri (Deutsche Bank)  Economic Times
description: Watch Vikas Dimri, Director, Head Busines Banking (SME), Deutsche Bank (India), International Private Bank in an interview with ETRise on the steps Deutsche Bank has taken to ease finance for MSMEs, and the financial products that Deutsche Bank has for MSMEs.
